A wide range of acceptance sampling plans are available to satisfy specific requirements and applications. Survey sampling is used in enumerative or analytical studies for estimating the values of one or more characteristics in a population, or for estimating how those characteristics are distributed across the population. Survey sampling is often associated with polls where information is gathered on people’s opinions on a subject, as in customer surveys. It can equally be applied to data-gathering for other purposes, such as audits. Specialized applications of survey sampling
